sen.j: 宝暦6年10月に前年に幼少で藩主になった島津重豪の国目付として江戸幕府より派遣された京極高主らに、この年10月に改められた分限帳が提出される。
sen.e: Between October and November, 1756, the Bugencho (registers of vassals) which was revised in October of this year was submitted to Takanushi KYOGOKU and his colleagues who were sent to the Satsuma domain by the Edo bakufu (Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun) as Kuni Metsuke (local inspector of foot soldiers) of Shigehide SHIMAZU who became the lord of the domain in his early childhood in the previous year, and in this Bugencho there was an entry that said "Shoin Yakunin Dobo, 48 hyo, Enami MORI".
